title: Component Library
description: Empty components/ directory causing code duplication. Currency formatting duplicated in 5+ files, user display name logic in 3+ files, date formatting in 4+ files, loading/error/empty states duplicated everywhere.

title: Global Error Boundary
description: Missing app/_error.tsx. App crashes on unhandled component errors with no user-friendly fallback.

title: Offline Queue Retry Limits
description: Failed pending expenses retry indefinitely in stores/expensesStore.ts:394-444. No max retry count or exponential backoff, no way to dismiss failed items.

title: Type Assertions Without Runtime Validation
description: API responses cast with 'as' without validation (e.g., response.expenses as Expense[]). Could cause crashes if API response changes.

title: Screen Components Too Large
description: app/group/[id].tsx is 893 lines, mixing business logic with presentation and multiple responsibilities.

title: Zero Component Test Coverage
description: Only 2 test files exist (auth + groups stores). 17 screen components untested, no integration or E2E tests.

title: No Theme System
description: Colors hardcoded (#007AFF, #666, #f0f0f0). 500+ lines of StyleSheet in single file. Need to create lib/theme.ts with design tokens.

title: No Request Timeouts
description: lib/api.ts:44-88 - fetch has no timeout. Requests can hang indefinitely. Add AbortController with 30s timeout.

title: Incomplete claimAccount API
description: stores/authStore.ts:153 has // TODO: Call API. Guest account claiming not implemented.

title: No Error Tracking
description: No Sentry or similar error tracking. Production errors are invisible, only console.log in dev.

title: Network vs API Errors Not Distinguished
description: Users don't know if connectivity or server issue. Need to add specific error types.

title: FlatList Not Optimized
description: app/(tabs)/index.tsx:48-62 - Missing initialNumToRender, windowSize, getItemLayout. Could lag with 100+ groups.

title: Device ID Uses Math.random()
description: stores/authStore.ts:13 uses Math.random(). Should use expo-crypto for secure random.

title: No Universal Links
description: Scheme defined but no associated domains. Missing iOS/Android deep link config.

title: Console.log in Production
description: Console.log statements in stores/expensesStore.ts:439, stores/syncStore.ts:78,95,105. Should replace with proper logger.

title: Inconsistent Import Ordering
description: No ESLint import sort rule configured.
